content: Real knowledge does not come from books, not even holy ones, but from experience. The best way of understanding reality is through feelings and intuition, not through the intellect. The intellect is limited.
translations: ita:La vera conoscenza non viene dai libri, neppure da quelli sacri, ma dall'esperienza. Il miglior modo per capire la realt
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Dejo (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
